title: QuickResume
description: A web app to generate professional resumes using Next.js and Firebase. Features AI-assisted templates and real-time editing.

title: STEMii
description: A STEM learning platform with AI-based self-assessment tools, built using ReactJS, NodeJS, and Firebase.

title: SakRean
description: Helps high school students choose a major through career-matching tools and academic resources.

title: Phishing Detection System
description: A Flask-based web app that uses ML and NLP to detect and block phishing emails in real time.

title: Khmer Dev
description: A side project that I built with a team of 3 people, I was responsible for the backend. KhmerDev is a website that allow people to learn code for free in khmer. Frontend is built using ReactJS, TailwindCss. Backend is built using NestJs, PostgresSQL, Redis and Docker.

title: KaksekAI
description: Kasekai is a Khmer-language mobile application designed to empower Cambodian farmers through smart features like land measurement, AI-powered crop analysis, and a farming assistant, offering personalized recommendations based on location, soil, and weatherâ€”with full offline support for rural accessibility. It is built using Flutter, Weather API, Gemini Vison API, Gemini Text Generation API, Google Maps, Firebase.
